long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your Data. Your Choice.

Powr of You is working to give people a way to take an active role in the data economy. We create a lot of data in our lives today by using various devices, social networks, internet browsers, health monitors, etc. At Powr of You, we realized that everyone uses our data to their benefit with analytics, insights that they monetize. However, you and I don’t share in this benefit today. So we built a tool to take that first step towards giving people a way to actively participate in the personal data economy.

Check out more of what more is happening at www.powrofyou.com

This extension allows you to connect your Powr of You account and gives you access to various insights. We do this in two-steps: 
1) Personalized Insights - The add-on sees how you traverse the web across various websites. It’s seamless, simply install the add-on and log-in to your Powr of You account. You do not need to interact with us any more than you want to :) 

2) Reward opportunities - Once connected, you will be matched to reward opportunities based on your profile and activity. We have integrated these into your Dashboard and Rewards. 

We are creating new insights on a regular basis to help you be more productive as you understand how you spend your time online. If you have something specific you would like to see, please email us at help@powrofyou.com.

Thank you for working with us to shape a better future for all! Please feel free to email us at help@powrofyou.com. We would love to hear feedback.

-Powr of You team
